lines: Nkwayanda koonse ndilaunka, Muli nguwe ndi lasyoma,
Akaambo kangu ndilizyi, Wakafwa a Kalivali.
Uya kundi sololela, Uya kundi sololela,
Ngu kasimpe mweenzuma, Kuti ndayeya Kalivali.
Ndila komana mu Mwami, Luyando lwakwe wandipa,
Ndila mulumba Muvuni, Bulowa bwa Kalivali.
Ndilaya koonse nsiyowi, A Klistu Muvuni wangu,
Ndizi ndiya ku mubona, Mweenzuma wa Kalivali.
